subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Nextel Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson finished seventh in Sunday’s  Ford 400 as he easily held off his friend and Hendrick Motorsports teammate Jeff Gordon for the title.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson finished seventh in Sunday’s  Ford 400 as he easily held off his friend and Hendrick Motorsports teammate Jeff Gordon for the title.
